steps.detail: Take photos or short videos of the panel, affected rooms, or waterfront equipment. Note breaker labels and any error codes.

steps.title: Contact Berman Electric
steps.detail: Call (516) 361-4068 or submit the online form. Mention Huntington so we can reserve a crew familiar with local inspections.

steps.title: Confirm access & permits
steps.detail: Our coordinator will review parking, dock access, and permit requirements with you. We handle the filing with the Town of Huntington when needed.

steps.title: Day-of service walkthrough

howTo.successNarrative: Once complete, you'll receive a digital closeout package with inspection sign-offs and recommended maintenance intervals tailored to Huntington properties.

howTo.title: How to Prepare for a Smithtown Electrical Upgrade
howTo.description: Use this checklist before our electricians arrive for a panel or generator upgrade in Smithtown.

steps.title: Confirm equipment placement
steps.detail: Identify exterior wall space for new panels or generators and clear vegetation within three feet.

steps.title: Gather documentation
steps.detail: Locate prior inspection cards, recent electrical bills, and any warranty paperwork for existing equipment.

steps.title: Notify building occupants
steps.detail: Let family members, tenants, or staff know when power will be temporarily interrupted so they can plan accordingly.

steps.title: Walk through safety items
steps.detail: Our foreman will review bonding, grounding, and surge protection upgrades with you before we energize the system.

howTo.successNarrative: After completion, we'll email inspection approvals, utility confirmations, and recommended maintenance intervals tailored to Smithtown properties.
